description: This file sets up an agent with tools for querying news, research papers, and valuations, and makes several calls to the agent to perform searches and retrieve information.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that can perform tasks using various tools.

classes.name: ExaTools
classes.description: A class providing tools for querying external data sources such as research papers and news.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to print or display the response from the agent after performing a query.
